get.description: Retrieve a list of hybrid runbook worker groups.

parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the automation account.
parameters.name: automationAccountName

parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: The response model for the list hybrid runbook worker groups.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of hybrid runbook worker groups.

items.description: Definition of hybrid runbook worker group.

credential.description: Sets the credential of a worker group.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the credential.

hybridRunbookWorkers.description: Gets or sets the list of hybrid runbook workers.

ip.description: Gets or sets the assigned machine IP address.

name.description: Gets or sets the worker machine name.

registrationTime.description: Gets or sets the registration time of the worker machine.

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the resource.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the group.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
